        从以下版本开始:

      • animatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> animatedText(java.lang.String text,
                                                                         int posstep,
                                                                         int delay,
                                                                         java.lang.String... formattingArray)
        Helper method to create an animated text.
        参数:
        text - The text to be animated
        posstep - How many steps formattingArray is shifted each delay
        delay - How many milliseconds are between each shift of formattingArray
        formattingArray - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on posstep and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formattingArray.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.0.0

      • animatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> animatedText(java.lang.String format,
                                                                         java.lang.Object[] args,
                                                                         int posstep,
                                                                         int delay,
                                                                         java.lang.String... formattingArray)
        Helper method to create a formatted and animated text.
        参数:
        format - The text to be formatted and animated
        args - The formatting arguments
        posstep - How many steps formattingArray is shifted each delay
        delay - How many milliseconds are between each shift of formattingArray
        formattingArray - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on posstep and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formattingArray.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.0.0

      • translatedAnimatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> translatedAnimatedText(java.lang.String translationKey,
                                                                                   int posstep,
                                                                                   int delay,
                                                                                   java.lang.String... formattingArray)
        Helper method to create a translated and animated text.
        参数:
        translationKey - The key used to look up the translation
        posstep - How many steps formattingArray is shifted each delay
        delay - How many milliseconds are between each shift of formattingArray
        formattingArray - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on posstep and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formattingArray.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.0.0

      • translatedAnimatedText

        public static java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> translatedAnimatedText(java.lang.String translationKey,
                                                                                   java.lang.Object[] args,
                                                                                   int posstep,
                                                                                   int delay,
                                                                                   java.lang.String... formattingArray)
        Helper method to create a translated, formatted and animated text
        参数:
        translationKey - The key used to look up the translation
        args - The formatting arguments
        posstep - How many steps formattingArray is shifted each delay
        delay - How many milliseconds are between each shift of formattingArray
        formattingArray - An array of formatting codes. Each char of text will be prefixed by one entry, depending on posstep and delay. Wraps around, if shorter than formattingArray.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.0.0
